title: Cointxz
author: Cointxz
content: Do you know any local gambling games in your country that crypto casino doesn’t offer until now?In our country, We have a lot of local gambling games that being offered by our local online casino but I still didn’t see in any crypto casino available here. I made the list below on our local gambling games that I want to be added by crypto casino.Color gameQuote from:  http://tamaraw8.blogspot.com/2014/09/tamaroid-color-game-pinoy-peryahan.htmlIt is a "Gamble/Parlor" Game  Seen in the Philippines mostly during "Fiesta" and Christmas Seasons on late 80's and 90's, as of now Some Towns and local Barangays in Provinces are still allowing this type of game (together with BINGO Games, "ROLETA", etc. ) only during Fiesta and NO MINORs are allowed to bet.The mechanics is simple, You just need to choose a Color to bet among six (6) Colors, and you or the operator must pull  a String or manually pull-up a lever to release the Multi-colored wooden Blocks/Dices. The Color on  the top of the (3) "rolled" wooden blocks/Dices are the winning colors.Tong-itsQuote from:  https://www.coololdgames.com/card-games/rummy/tong-its/Tong-its is played using the standard Anglo-American pattern 52-card deck. Unlike many Rummy variations, Tong-its does not make use of the Jokers sometimes available.Tong-its is exclusively a three-player game, something which makes it unique among the Rummy-family. The odd number of Players, as well as the inability to add or subtract Players from the game, makes for an interesting deal as well. This short tutorial will explain the basic concepts of the game.Pusoy Way & Pusoy DosThis game is like poker in terms of card combination hierarchy it just vary on the way cards being played. You can read full mechanics on this blog https://www.pinoygame.net/news/detail/18/Pusoy-Pinoy-How-to-play.htmlLucky 9A card game that same mechanics with Baccarat. It just played like Blackjack which player can have multiple seat and has the capability to hit or stand. This gives the freedom for players to play for there own decision unlike Baccarat that you are just choosing side.You can share your own game below. Just make sure that it’s a GAMBLING GAME. Post the brief mechanics and add reference for the full description of the game.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: I know all the games that you mentioned I agree you cannot find these games in any casinos because it is only for locals in the Philippines and its a favorite among local gamblers, I would like to add sabong or cock fighting yes this is very controversial and so many locals here become addicted to this game and we even have online casinos dedicated for this game exclusive for our country, until our government stopped it because of so many anomalies.If the majority of casinos will adopt this game a lot of gamblers will be addicted to this game.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Interesting... but these games lhave a particular appeal in a specific nation or community I don't believe they can be promoted by companies that try to get attention on a global audience.there are some card games played during Christmas (like "PIATTO") which are very famous here in Italy (plus other variants in base of region) but I would hardly see them in an international casino also because the rules would have to be explained etc etc and the usual problem of "trusting" the games would arise.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: The reason are simple.Most of online-casino it's using a provider, so they no need to make the game or provided the game by them self. It's more complicated rather than using a provider, with provider they just can easily pay and set up to their site.Also, they not really need a big marketing for the game. Why ? because If we using "Evo" provider all of user evo are already familiar and could be playing in the site.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Quote from: aioc on March 31, 2023, 01:15:50 PMI know all the games that you mentioned I agree you cannot find these games in any casinos because it is only for locals in the Philippines and its a favorite among local gamblers.Yeah all these games is from Philippines. I recently play some of this game such as color game and tong-its on bingo plus casino when I browse recently on Gcash games. It’s just amazing how this game turn into real gambling by online platform while I just play this on tongits go app that doesn’t use real money. I’m surprised on this new game added on Bingo plus and I will not aware of this Bingo plus if this casino doesn’t add on gcash apps.Quote from: ryzaadit on March 31, 2023, 01:43:23 PMThe reason are simple.Most of online-casino it's using a provider, so they no need to make the game or provided the game by them self. It's more complicated rather than using a provider, with provider they just can easily pay and set up to their site.Also, they not really need a big marketing for the game. Why ? because If we using "Evo" provider all of user evo are already familiar and could be playing in the site.Agree on this, I get this idea after noticing the Andar Bahar game when I’m browsing the evolution gaming lobby. This game is a local game from India and it’s just added last year https://www.evolution.com/news/evolution-launches-super-andar-bahar-indian-classic-with-added-massive-multipliers/. This gives me an idea that game provider is starting to add local games if there’s a demand on it. The game I mention above is very popular in our country that being played in daily basis.It will be nice discussing potential local games that will be newly added by game provider to introduce globally.

comments.author: electronicash
comments.body: first time i played that lucky 9 was when i was a kid at my grandpa's wake. kind of a game that the elders don't mind kids playing but its still gambling or maybe they just let it slide out of respect for the dead because after the wake was over, it was back to hiding while playing cards again.the most popular in our country besides sabong is the tong-its. even single moms are addicted to it.

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: The latter card games was the usual gambling activity that I use to play way back in my last days in elementary and high school, in my town these never gets old. It's likely an accustomed to many here especially during the wake of anyone as long as they're catholic. Since casinos these days try to cater universal customer I think it's best if a local casino would promote it.

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Cock fight is one game I love so much and though I only get to watch this type of game in Asian and Chinese movies, I find them very interesting and I one some occasions had to place a bet on the fight when watching them in movies especially a first time watched movies but I think and know that betting on such games since I was only watching from movies wasn't right since there might be more chances of cheating but whatever the case might be, I always find the game very much interesting and entertaining.Sack race is another very entertaining game for me and I think it's worth being in a casino.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: Maybe the developers need to research before bringing local gambling games in many countries to be adopted in crypto casinos so gamblers can better know them. This type of game is indeed well known by local gamblers but not for international gamblers, that is, those who often use online casinos, both fiat and crypto.And if there is interest from the developers in trying to apply the local gambling game to online, fiat and crypto casinos, they will launch the local gambling game and add it to the list of casino games. And for the time being, you can still visit the local casino to play the gambling game but I don't know if they accept crypto or only fiat for betting.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Obari on March 31, 2023, 02:49:53 PMCock fight is one game I love so much and though I only get to watch this type of game in Asian and Chinese movies, I find them very interesting and I one some occasions had to place a bet on the fight when watching them in movies especially a first time watched movies but I think and know that betting on such games since I was only watching from movies wasn't right since there might be more chances of cheating but whatever the case might be, I always find the game very much interesting and entertaining.Sack race is another very entertaining game for me and I think it's worth being in a casino.There are a lot of controversies when a lot of cock fighting casinos are online and because of this the government of the Philippines stopped all the operations, there are too many games fixing so many killings and too many kidnappings and the government cannot let this continue but if ever some casinos adapt it although unlikely, they should never make the mistake of these local versions of cock fighting and the setup should be very different.This is wishful thinking because it's hard to introduce new games from game providers especially if they come from one country.

comments.author: virasisog
comments.body: Those local gambling games are actually part of my childhood and still play them whenever our family has a simple get-together. In some local casinos, these games are being introduced especially the color game and tong its. I think it isn't being introduced internationally since it's just famous in the Philippines. Of course, international casinos would prioritize well-known games over local or traditional gambling games because famous games could easily attract players.

Your list is indeed true but to categorize it; these gambling games are simply street based gambling games. These are basically gambling games which are more accessible with convenience to players wherein a deck of card can generate mutiple betting games. But to add, spider betting game and other animal betting games.Others are coin toss and other probability gambling games. There's more for sure including betting agreements on a particular concern such as number of this and that. This simply implies that gambling industry is far from what most of us know. There are many betting games which could generate profit. Any thing wherein contrary would be the bottomline as long as the contrary sides are okay with the long end growth and we just cannot so something about it.

comments.author: adzino
comments.body: Not much of a gambler, but most of the common gambling games here can be found at almost all crypto casinos. Never heard of the games that you have posted though. So I guess we don't see much of those games in online crypto casinos because they aren't much popular. So developing those games and maintaining would just be a waste of resource. If players wanted those games, they would have asked for it. I am also sure there are some niche casinos out there that provides those games.

But then as what we can see it is really possible to make everything into crypto since it can be easy to adapt by other people and all things now can be converted with our latest technology. And the thing is those gambling games that he mentioned oftentimes can be found illegal that is why it is very popular in here.

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: There more a lot of casinos that are played in my locality which is not in the online casinos. Most of them I do not even know their English names, I only came across them the play ground and follow them to play. Prediction of currency numbers, guess games, hide and seek games, rubber bound games etc. Those games are so much interesting that they make us busy and have fun with peers. Game is life and make someone to forget his sorrow.

comments.author: slapper
comments.body: Quote from: Obari on March 31, 2023, 02:49:53 PMCock fight is one game I love so much and though I only get to watch this type of game in Asian and Chinese movies, I find them very interesting and I one some occasions had to place a bet on the fight when watching them in movies especially a first time watched movies but I think and know that betting on such games since I was only watching from movies wasn't right since there might be more chances of cheating but whatever the case might be, I always find the game very much interesting and entertaining.Sack race is another very entertaining game for me and I think it's worth being in a casino.Man, seriously, do you dig watching rooster brawls? Well, different strokes for different folks, but that's just bird-on-bird action. Pun is fully loaded! Look, I ain't judging. Everyone's got their peculiar brand of fun, no matter how bizarre or off-the-wall it appears. Heck, perhaps there's a clandestine rooster-rumble society lurking beneath the surface! As for sack hopping, I grasp your amusement. It's like a time machine back to kiddie days, goofin' around with pals. Picture this: a casino packed with grown-ups bouncing in sacks? Comedy gold!

comments.author: Sandra_hakeem
comments.body: Quote from: Obari on March 31, 2023, 02:49:53 PMCock fight is one game I love so much and though I only get to watch this type of game in Asian and Chinese movies, I find them very interesting and I one some occasions had to place a bet on the fight when watching them in movies especially a first time watched movies but I think and know that betting on such games since I was only watching from movies wasn't right since there might be more chances of cheating but whatever the case might be, I always find the game very much interesting and entertaining.Sack race is another very entertaining game for me and I think it's worth being in a casino.Cock fight can't be found amongst crypto casinos,...cus why?? it's just naturally played - not some infuriating programed cock, playing or rather fighting on screens,.. following already programmed instructions...NO!!It's not also gonna be possible to run a live cock-fight on on-line crypto casinos..I don't even think it's made available in visible casino houses here.Snail racing is normally practiced too;I learnt that it's been going on for a long time now, Only that it looks really awful and less-interesting to some... likely, a vast portion of gamers. All this games are gonna get really wierd if they're introduced In a digital screen.Sandra 🧑‍🦰

comments.author: Casdinyard
comments.body: It's not because the gambling site you're in is a little deaf to the people's requests because believe me, the online casino community has one of the most responsive people in the world. In any case the reason why these games, much I like to see them coz hey, I love me some chinese poker too every now and then, is the fact that these games only appear to a certain group of people and do not cater towards everyone. When you create a game in a casino setting, you have to be able to cater to a wider range of people that transcends against age, race, and location. These games are so ingrained in the Philippine psyche and society they pretty much owned these games too and would incite some reaction, good or not, if they were to see it being played in the casino.

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: I'm from Croatia, and I wanted to mention the card game "Bela" (Belot). It's a very popular game here, and it's played with a deck of 32 cards, and it's often played at social gatherings and family events. It's a trick-taking game, similar to Bridge or Spades, but with some different rules. Despite its popularity, I haven't seen it in any crypto casino yet, and I think it would be great to have it as an option for players who enjoy card games.

comments.author: TravelMug
comments.body: I think Pusoy or Pusoy Dos was being played way back in some casino's here, I totally forget the name but it has a signature campaign.As you have said, our Lucky 9 is like baccarat so for sure Pinoys will be able to play that in a casino. Roulette is still playing played in City of Dreams, as high as x50 in returns. Color games as far as I can remember, Resorts World has like that one as well, but it was White and Red colors only.
